parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The touchscreen registers "ghost presses" without input
scrolls through contacts and places calls while driving
develops "spiderweb" cracking
and reboots continuously
causing loss of access to radio
GPS
and other features.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the rear view camera can cause reduced visibility while reversing, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The rear view camera restarts and flickers
making it difficult to see behind the vehicle while in reverse.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air conditioning system can cause discomfort and distraction while driving, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The evaporator blows warm air into the cabin
and a pressure test reveals a leak in the evaporator.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The accumulation of moisture in the headlamps can cause reduced visibility and potentially lead to electrical problems.
symptoms: Moisture accumulates in the headlamps
causing a softer light and reduced visibility.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the brake system can cause loss of control and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to stop upon depression of the brake pedal
and the parking brake is engaged
but the vehicle continues to roll back.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the electrical system can cause loss of power and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
and all warning lights go on
then the vehicle dies and cannot be restarted.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The moisture infiltration in the headlights can cause diffused, dimmed visibility at night, leading to reduced safety and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Moisture or water accumulation inside the headlight assembly
reduced light output
diffused or scattered light
limited visibility during night driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to potential accidents.
symptoms: The infotainment screen changes channels or calls random people without user input
especially when the vehicle is in park or at a stop light.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A cracked infotainment display can be a distraction and may lead to further system failures.
symptoms: A visible crack in the corner of the Mazda Connect center display.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: Sudden loss of power while driving
no warning lights or indicators.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Worn-out brakes beyond minimum standards
no brake warning light to alert the driver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A malfunctioning rear tailgate can be inconvenient and may lead to further issues.
symptoms: The rear tailgate will not open.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine cranking issues can cause inconvenience and may lead to further engine problems.
symptoms: Warm engine takes a long time to crank
starts right up when the engine is cold.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Sudden acceleration without user input
especially when braking or turning.
